application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of an enhanced sound insulation value of at least 5dB above the ADE maximum Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings/areas, namely, bedrooms/ studio bedspace below/above/adjoining kitchen/living/dining/bathroom of separate flat and of at least 10dB enhancement for bedrooms adjoining the communal main entrances, staircase to the upper flats in pursuant to condition 11 of planning permission 242526FUL dated 23/09/2024 for: Conversion of 2 self-contained residential units into 4 self-contained residential units with associated amenity space, cycle and refuse storage; part single-storey, part two-storey rear/side extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension; rear roof terrace at first and second floor levels & installation of three rooflights to front roof slope [re-consultation]
